content: I think I'll try something a bit different for my Tuesday stream. I've been wanting to do a behind-the-scenes stream, where I give my audience a tour of my workspace and show them how I plan and prepare for my live streams. It'll be a more relaxed and casual stream, and I think it'll help my audience connect with me on a more personal level. Plus, it'll be a great way to diversify my content and offer something new and unique.
